report.title: eBMS species counts by sample for a survey
report.description: Lists locations and the number of species within them.
report.query: SELECT #columns# from cache_samples_functional s join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.sample_id = s.id join cache_samples_nonfunctional csn on csn.id = s.id #joins# WHERE #website_filter# AND (CAST(o.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND s.created_by_id=#user_id#

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the warehouse user

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
